criteria.name: Forensic Accuracy
criteria.description: Evidence is grounded, cross-references repo + report, avoids hallucination, and cites sources clearly.

criteria.name: Graph Architecture
criteria.description: Clear LangGraph fan-out/fan-in structure, reducers, typed state, and correct orchestration.

criteria.name: Judicial Nuance
criteria.description: Distinct judge personas, evidence-grounded disagreement, and a clear synthesis process.

criteria.name: AI Usage & Judgment
criteria.description: Uses LLMs correctly for judgment, structured output, and separates reasoning from facts.

criteria.name: Quality of Execution
criteria.description: Runnable, readable, secure, and production-quality patterns (errors handled, no unsafe calls).
